author: Detroit Free Press Pop Culture Critic
title: 'Detroiters' impresses Twitterverse, critics with premiere
text: Let friends in your social network know what you are reading about Facebook Email 'Detroiters' impresses Twitterverse, critics with premiere The Comedy Central show scores a positive response from viewers and a 91 fresh rating on Rotten Tomatoes Post to Facebook 'Detroiters' impresses Twitterverse, critics with premiere The Comedy Central show scores a positive response from viewers and a 91 fresh rating on Rotten Tomatoes Check out this story on Freep.com: http://on.freep.com/2k2RPRL Cancel Send A link has been sent to your friend's email address. Posted! A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. 2 To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs 'Detroiters' impresses Twitterverse, critics with premiere Julie Hinds , Detroit Free Press Pop Culture Critic Published 8:55 a.m. ET Feb. 8, 2017 | Updated 55 minutes ago Facebook Posted! A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. Distinct Life, a Detroit-based design agency and the creators behind the theme song of Comedy Central’s new show Detroiters, celebrated the premiere of the show with a viewing party at the Brush and Madison Studios in downtown Detroit on Tuesday, Feb. 7, 2017. The event was highlighted by a Q-and-A session with the Distinct Life founder and a live performance of the show’s theme song by Detroit-based singer Marcellus Hogan.
